sentences.en: Accusations of impropriety were made against the company’s directors.
sentences.cn: 对公司董事不正当的行为提出了指控。

sentences.en: Have you noticed any impropriety in the lab since you've been assigned here?
sentences.cn: 自从你来这里,是否注意到实验室有何不对的地方?

sentences.en: He refuses to play with company executives or reporters to avoid perceptions of impropriety.
sentences.cn: 为避免造成行为不当的观感,他拒绝与公司高管或记者打球.

sentences.en: He resigned amid allegations of financial impropriety.
sentences.cn: 他因在财务上不恰当的陈述辞职了。

sentences.en: He was , however, so convinced of what he considered to be the impropriety of Eleanor's conduct.
sentences.cn: 不过他深信爱莉娜的行为是有失检点的.

sentences.en: He waved off suggestions of impropriety.
sentences.cn: 他撤消了不适当的建议.

sentences.en: I expostulate with her on the impropriety.
sentences.cn: 因行为不当我向她提出告诫.

sentences.en: I was surprised by the impropriety of his remarks.
sentences.cn: 他的话不得体,我听了很诧异.

sentences.en: I worried at the impropriety of running the siren so early in the morning.
sentences.cn: 我很是郁闷,大清早的,何必救护车警报拉得山响地扰民呢.

sentences.en: If there impropriety occurring in this instruction book, the two parties should talke to solve it.
sentences.cn: 在执行本规格书的过程中出现不合适时, 由双方迅速协商解决.

sentences.en: Impropriety is the soul of wit.
sentences.cn: 不规矩是打趣话的精髓.

sentences.en: Now, he was more concerned about the impropriety of visiting Zeftel at this hour.
sentences.cn: 他眼下更关心的是,这么晚去找泽?咛囟?有失体统.

sentences.en: Parliament was accused of constitutional impropriety.
sentences.cn: 议会被指控有违宪行为.

sentences.en: People even suspected some sort of impropriety in her private life.
sentences.cn: 人们甚至怀疑到她的生活作风上是否有不够慎重的地方!

sentences.en: Some dim ideas of imprudence or impropriety in the measure seemed to embrass him considerably.
sentences.cn: 他模模糊糊意识到这一行动似乎有点不正常,不谨慎,因而感到进退两难.

sentences.en: They were shocked by the impropriety of the young man's action.
sentences.cn: 他们为那年轻人的不当举止而感到震惊.

sentences.en: This is also the local economy is highly dependent on another real estate impropriety.
sentences.cn: 而这,则又是地方经济高度依赖房地产的又一不当之处.

words.tran_cn: 不正确的，错误的；不适当的；不合礼仪的
不适当；不正确；用词错误；[审计]不正当行为

trans.tran_cn: 不得体，不适当，不得体的举止，不正确
